name: Bdtask CRM Best CRM WordPress plugin with full marketing Solution
author: bdtask

sections.description:
“Bdtask CRM” is a modern CRM wordpress plugin and customer management system.
This Bdtask CRM wordpress plugin is usefull for taking orders and quotations information from client.
It is 100% user friendly and responsive wordpress ‘CRM’ plugin.
This wordpress bdtask CRM plugin can be used for orders , leads and quotation booking like Inventory Management system(ERP),
software company, shop crm, event order and booking manually, general crm, and whatever you want Everything manually doing.

Features

1.Add Leads.
2.Add Customers.
3.Add Quotations.
4.Add Orders.
5.Pdf invoice email.
6.Modern customer management System(Crm)
7.Fresh and Clean Code,
8.Any Language Supported.
9.Fully Customizable admin panel.
10.Make the Design as your Theme.
11.100% User friendly.
12.All Browser Supported.
13.handle manually.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘bdtaskcrm’
  3. Activate bdtaskcrm from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Bdtaskcrm Plugin.
  2. Upload the ‘Bdtaskcrm’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Bdtask ‘Bdtaskcrm’ from your Plugins page.

How do I install bdtaskcrm?

Using the WordPress Plugin Search

  1. Navigate to the Add New Plugins admin page.
  2. Search for bdtaskcrm directory.
  3. The plugin should be listed first in the search results.
  4. Click the Install Now link.
  5. Lastly click the Activate Plugin link to activate the plugin.
